metadata.title: CVE-2024-8641 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 13.7 prior to 17.1.7, from 17.2 prior to 17.2.5, and from17.3 prior to 17.3.2. It may have been possible for an attacker with avictim's CI_JOB_TOKEN to obtain a GitLab session token belonging to thevictim.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
